thread.title: Anderson Collection a modern art trove not to be missed
thread.title_full: Anderson Collection a modern art trove not to be missed - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Anh-Minh Le
title: Anderson Collection a modern art trove not to be missed
text:
Photo: Tim Griffith print_article_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|1 email_share_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|5 google_share_embed|photo-8483434|article-6458296|6 The Anderson Collection at Stanford University opened almost a year ago. The Anderson Collection at Stanford University opened almost a year...
About twice a month, Mary Margaret Anderson pays a visit to the museum on the Stanford campus that bears her last name. Moo, as she is better known, usually chats with the staff before declaring, “I’m off to see my friends.” The Anderson Collection at Stanford University opened almost a year ago. The Anderson Collection at Stanford University opened almost a year...
About twice a month, Mary Margaret Anderson pays a visit to the museum on the Stanford campus that bears her last name. Moo, as she is better known, usually chats with the staff before declaring, “I’m off to see my friends.”
